profileAlternative.name: Carolyn Ge
profileAlternative.headline: CS @ Harvard
profileAlternative.summary:
Hi! I am an undergraduate at Harvard University studying Computer Science with a secondary in Statistics. I'm excited to be joining Facebook as a Software Engineering Intern in Menlo Park this summer.

Feel free to contact me at carolynge@college.harvard.edu!

aboutAlternative.text:
Hi! I am an undergraduate at Harvard University studying Computer Science with a secondary in Statistics. I'm excited to be joining Facebook as a Software Engineering Intern in Menlo Park this summer.

Feel free to contact me at carolynge@college.harvard.edu!

positions.title: Comp Director
positions.description: Design and oversee initiatives for introducing and integrating new members into the WiCS community. Organize educational and social events to promote diversity and inclusion in the CS community on campus.

positions.title: Summer Research Intern
positions.location: New Mexico Tech, Socorro, New Mexico
positions.description: Led a team to analyze and conduct research on near-earth asteroid orbital path, used Python to determine photometry, orbital elements, and probable future collisions, submitted and published data to the Minor Planet Center

items: Linear Algebra and Real Analysis I
Mathematics for Computation, Statistics, and Data Science
Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs
Three-time Conrad Spirit of Innovation Challenge Finalist
